app.title: Life Prediction App
app.subtitle: Predict your trajectory based on choices within your control

age_input.title: Life Parameters Setup
age_input.description: First, let's establish your baseline parameters for life expectancy prediction.

intro.title: Understanding What You Can Control
intro.description: Life is often brutal and unfair. External factors beyond your control will frequently disappoint you. This app focuses solely on what remains within your power: your attention, intention, and mindfulness.
intro.explanation: We'll ask you simple questions about fundamental choices, then show you two types of predictions:

types.abstract: Abstract Aspects: Your internal strength and resilience (highly predictable)
types.concrete: Concrete Outcomes: External results like money, respect, relationships (highly unpredictable)

intro.countdown_note: Based on statistical predictions and your choices

questions.title: Life Assessment Questions
questions.description: Answer each question to build your life trajectory prediction. Click on each question to expand and make your choice.

predictions.title: Your Life Trajectory
predictions.reality_check: Remember: External outcomes depend heavily on factors beyond your control. Build internal strength regardless of external results.

direct_predictions.title: Quick Predictions
direct_predictions.description: View your life trajectory based on previous assessment results, without answering questions again.

messages.complete_parameters: Complete life parameters setup to see health and lifespan information.
messages.set_parameters_first: Please set your life parameters first before viewing predictions.
messages.select_dob: Please select your date of birth
messages.select_health: Please select at least one health condition (including "None/Healthy" if applicable)
messages.future_dob: Date of birth cannot be in the future
messages.invalid_age: Age must be between 1 and 120 years
